product_name: Twinings Pure Camomile Tea, 25 Tea Bags: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: **~Twinnings has a great variety of teas and this particular one is great for sipping at night before bed. It’s has a mild and flowery pleasant smell.The taste is mild as well. The first time will be kinda difficult because without any sweetener it feels like sipping some hot water but the taste will grow on you. You’ll learn to adjust it after a couple of times.It has actually helped me relax and sleep better. I’m looking forward to buy more in the future .

Although expensive, as are the other teas from Twinings, this is a good one to sip at night. It has slight muscle relaxing properties. It made a difference to my menstrual cramps when I had it. I re use the tea bags in my bath for a nice aromatic experience. I like this product and would recommend!

reviews.review_title: Nice tea bag,better than green tea
reviews.review_body: The tea bags are very much different from green tea . It's very soothing. Flavour is like pettles and it's nice for health . After trying 2 bags it's feel nice . Stomach,mind feel relaxed, as expected package is nice and delivered on time
Its good for a mild flavour, but you will soon get used to it and will not like it any more. Not very popular for India, where stronger spices have great likeness.

I have brought this tea pack for some time. I dont find the flavour consistent. It was very nice when i purchased the first time. The third time i brought there was a difference in taste.I thought its okay, this happens and didnt want to comment on it.The fourth time i purchased and recieved the pack today and i found the blend completely off. I am not sure why this product is not consistent. I  just checked the pack i received today and it was packed in the month of March (4 months old).Again i doubt if they pack and store this product properly.This product is expensive. The least they can do is maintain the quality.

reviews.review_title: Pictures of the tea! Upvote if helpful
reviews.review_body: Twinnings chamomile is stronger than unwind chamomile teaMore flavorful.The transparent glass is twinningsAnd mug is unwind but the picture isnt so clear but its lighter than twinnings

It usually takes time for me to get adjusted to some taste.. But this one is very mild.. And it worked for me.. I felt relaxed and fell off sleep in half an hour.. Its going to be new before bed ritual.. Loved it..
Aroma is very good. Feels like smelling some flower.  Taste is ok. But the effect of calmness is awesome. After full day stress having one cup in evening it's is very relaxing.
